title: Easy red pepper houmous
ingredients: ['1 (400g) tin chickpeas, drained and rinsed', '1 tablespoon olive oil', '1 medium red pepper, quartered', '1 tablespoon tahini', '1 fresh lime, juiced', '1 1/2 tablespoons water', '1/2 teaspoon salt', '1/4 teaspoon freshly ground black pepper', '1 clove garlic']
